welcome_message_body: "Welcome to San Miniato, a charming and historic city known for its stunning views, delicious local cuisine, and rich culture. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring and experiencing all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lucca Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Lucca Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Peretola Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 is used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
